name: send HTTP requests
description: Sends HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE) with optional headers, params, and body.

url.description: Absolute URL to request. Must start with http or https.

headers.description: Optional headers to send as key-value pairs.

json.description: JSON body to send. Mutually exclusive with 'data'.

data.description: Raw request body (e.g., form-encoded or plain text). Mutually exclusive with 'json'.

allow_redirects.description: Whether to follow redirects. Defaults to true.

verify_tls.description: Verify TLS certificates. Defaults to true.

status_code.description: HTTP status code from the response.

response_headers.description: Response headers returned by the server.

response_json.description: Parsed JSON body if available; otherwise omitted.
